title: The Director [Widescreen]

description: An ex crew member in witness protection recalls what it was like to work for "Jack" - the eponymous director of the title. The finely tuned professional outfit that is "the crew", arrive at the Western Bank for a shoot, centred around the director, a man who wields awesome power and will do anything for the sake of realism and reaping the benefits at the box office.
